text: HRdt 744_TTTHf xfetqrrut 394 / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Tet @aev &_{THTf AT4) Y47 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 Qq 6, #aer-10, &RoT, # ferif-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/GST/2021 Policy No. 3.3.24/2021 dated 24th November 2021 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/FEA/GST-2021-22/SM-Vol.IV (Comp.No.1- 114969)} Corrigendum Sub:: Clarification  regarding  applicability of GST on payment of  Annuity under BOT projects completed before implementation of GST on 01.07.2017- reg: Reference Policy Guidelines 3.3.23/2021 dated 24.11.2021 on the above mentioned subject. The word 'suppression" in para 3 of said   circular may please be read as supersession" _ Reskaxv (Sunil Prakash Bhardwaj) Chief General Manager (Coord.)
